EN.about_me: I am a highly motivated Full Stack developer, I possess a broad range of technical skills. I am a constant self-learner with a focus on continuous improvement and skill upgrading. I have developed expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and ReactJS for front-end development and have experience with NodeJS, MongoDB, and ExpressJS for back-end development. Additionally, I am familiar with implementing modern and attractive designs using frameworks such as Chakra UI and Tailwind CSS. I have completed a professional certification in Front End Development and taken an intensive Web Development Bootcamp Full-Stack course, providing me with a solid foundation to tackle any IT challenge. I am a dynamic and analytical person with problem-solving skills, enabling me to work efficiently on complex projects.
EN.form_thanks_message: Let's go for a Virtual Coffee!

ES.about_me: Soy un desarrollador Full Stack con habilidades en HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB y ExpressJS. Soy autodidacta y enfocado en el aprendizaje continuo, he completado un certificado profesional en Front End Development y un curso intensivo en Web Development Bootcamp Full-Stack. Además, tengo habilidades analíticas y dinámicas, lo que me permite abordar proyectos complejos de manera eficiente. Mi personalidad amable y organizada, junto con mi enfoque en la placeholderación constante, me convierten en una persona emocionada por explorar y crecer en el mundo de la tecnología de la inplaceholderación.
